title: Title
form4: The old password is entered incorrectly
aboutUsText: Hello, users of the foydalaning.uz (savobli.uz) website. In order to turn this site into an information resource base of articles, tips, PROMOTIONS, ANNOUNCEMENTS and BUSINESS offers held in our country, it was created in cooperation with qualified teacher programmers of the educational center "EduSpace Academy" based on the idea of   Abdullayev Bakhtiyor. The site is mainly composed of 3 sections (scientific ARTICLES-advice, PROMOTIONS, BUSINESS OFFERS) which in turn are composed of different categories. The desired user has the opportunity to choose a category and post a picture, article, information about the action he is holding, and a business offer. For this purpose, he registers, writes an article in the field he understands well, and sends it to the database of the site along with a corresponding picture. The 2nd name of the site is Savobli.uz. The advice-article posted by you will give our compatriots free advice when buying something or starting a business or looking for a place. You can also post information on the site and win valuable prizes established by the founders of the info-resource. The established awards competition is organized fairly and honestly, and the user gives the rating (like it or not). We will be pleased with your suggestions, criticisms and comments about Foydalaning.uz Info-resource. May God reward those who help spread this information to others!
